item.title: About
item.description: Hope is Antifragile For some, hope is simply a resilient property. They hope and so they are able to persist. But I contend that hope can be an antifragile property, and action, that gets stronger over time. The things you hope for get closer to becoming as time passes and so your hope strengthens over time. Of course, paradoxically, your hope may get weaker over time precisely because the things you hope for have yet to be realized.
